data.title: Visit Brookhaven Mississippi

[av_textblock size=’16’ font_color=” color=” av-medium-font-size=” av-small-font-size=” av-mini-font-size=” admin_preview_bg=”]

Merry Christmas!

This time of year is the perfect time to reflect on how beautiful the town of Brookhaven is with all of the gorgeous Christmas lights. It sure is something to see our town decked out in its holiday finest. We hope you will take a stroll in downtown and take the opportunity to see the Christmas lights highlighting the beauty of Brookhaven. We are truly grateful for an awesome town full of beauty.

Coming through Brookhaven this Holiday? Don’t forget about our wonderful local shops and delicious restaurants that are sure to help you enjoy your time in Brookhaven. Check out our website if you need ideas for places to eat, stay or play while in town.

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year. May this Christmas find you surrounded by those you Love, filled with a lot of fun and cheer!

[/av_textblock]

[/av_one_full]
